---
name: audit:ui-a11y
description: Audit UI for accessibility basics (keyboard, focus, semantics, states).
agent: "ask"
---

Given the selected UI scope:

- Identify a11y issues (keyboard nav, focus, labels, roles, contrast, error states)
- Provide specific fixes (component-level)
- Provide a minimal verification checklist (manual steps + tooling if available)

Output: ranked findings + patch plan.
